tidbits.title: Celtic and Viking Heritage
tidbits.description: The Isle of Man boasts a unique heritage, blending Celtic and Viking influences seen in its folklore, language, and historic sites.

tidbits.title: TT Motorcycle Races
tidbits.description: The island is famous for the TT (Tourist Trophy) motorcycle races, attracting enthusiasts worldwide to its thrilling and challenging course.

tidbits.title: Countryside Charm
tidbits.description: The Isle of Man offers countryside charm with picturesque landscapes, coastal beauty, and a relaxed pace of life that draws visitors year-round.
